properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN VICINITY
47-47.2N 010-32.0W AT 161021Z DEC. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0028, 44 344 382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
